title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Updated
description: This task has been updated to comprehensively gather and document the detailed requirements for the StrategicAlignmentTracker tool. The updated requirements include: specifying the types of strategic goals and initiatives to be tracked, outlining desired visualization and reporting capabilities, detailing integration requirements with existing systems, defining user roles, permissions, and access levels, addressing data security and privacy considerations, and including any other functional and non-functional requirements. Additionally, a clear process for feedback and iterative refinement of the tool's design has been established. The updated requirements will be used to guide the next stages of development.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data model, user interface, and integration points with other systems. Define the technology stack and development approach. Consider scalability, maintainability, and performance requirements. Outline the high-level components, their responsibilities, and interactions. Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies, providing clear documentation for each component and their interdependencies. Ensure the design is flexible to accommodate future changes and aligns with the project's scope and requirements.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, build automation, and deployment pipelines.

title: Implement Backend
description: Develop the backend components, including the data model, business logic, and integration with other systems.

title: Implement Frontend
description: Develop the user interface and visualization components for the StrategicAlignmentTracker tool.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures, such as authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the data.

title: Set up Testing Framework
description: Establish a testing framework, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the StrategicAlignmentTracker tool, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the StrategicAlignmentTracker tool to the production environment and set up monitoring and logging systems to ensure its proper functioning and performance.
